t: Amazon.com: Neoflam Retro 11-Inch Cast Aluminum Frying Pan with Soft-Touch Handle and Ecolon Non-Stick Coating: Home & Kitchen
s: Neoflam is not only cast aluminum, but is also ceramic coated so cleaning is super easy. Depending on what you've cooked, most of them rinse clean under hot water with a little dish soap. If I could afford it, I'd give a set of this stuff to everybody I love. ... I absolutely love this pan / brand !
